div.p: How do I use the tools available to me?
WebAdivsor was excellent to check my transcripts--
I always had to see what when my grades were coming in--
to make my payments online, that was excellent.
Angel is actually a very good tool.
You have your discussions, you can keep in contact with your professors.
The tools available really help you with the condensed classes and keeping your schedule.
ANGEL was the easiest way to keep in contact with your professors and the other students.
